  "title": "Universal Forces and the Dark Energy Problem",
  "comments": "9 pages. no figures",
  "journal-ref": null,
  "doi": null,
  "report-no": null,
  "categories": "physics.gen-ph",
  "license": null,
  "abstract": "  The Dark Energy problem is forcing us to re-examine our models and our\nunderstanding of relativity and space-time. Here a novel idea of Fundamental\nForces is introduced. This allows us to perceive the General Theory of\nRelativity and Einstein's Equation from a new pesrpective. In addition to\nproviding us with an improved understanding of space and time, it will be shown\nhow it leads to a resolution of the Dark Energy problem.\n",
